(as of Nov 30,2022 04:41:11 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Peasur 138 LED Solar Lights Outdoor

Solar light has motion smart sensor, which can detect motion sensitively. Use the sun to charge during the day and automatically light up at night. It is ideal for night lighting of pathways, driveways, gardens, hallways, patios, etc.Our solar security light has 3 modes to choose from, you can choose different modes according to your needs.MODE 1.[ Constant light mode]: Auto power on at night, auto power off during the day.This mode can be on for 5-8 hours.MODE 2.[Dim light sensor mode]ÔºöLow brightness no motion,full brightness when the motion is detected.Detection time is about 20 seconds.MODE 3.[Sensor light mode]: Full brightness when the motion is detected,close when no motion.(Recommended to use.)Detection time is about 20 seconds.

Warm Tip:

You need to install the solar panel in a place where the sun can shine, and the charging effect will be better when the switch is turned on.Please install the solar panel in a place where the sun can shine, the best installation height is 2-3 meters, the sensor is the most sensitive.If you need to open it during the day, you need to cover the solar panel to light up.The first time you use it, you need to tear off the plastic film on the surface of the solar panel and expose them to more than 8 hours.

Product Details

Battery: 1200 mAh LED Quantity: 138 LED Lighting Angle: 180¬∞ Detection angle: 120 ¬∞ Waterproof level: IP65 Ideal installation height: 2-3 meters Material: ABS plastic Sensor range: within 6-8 meters Charging time: 8-12 hours Use time: Full power always bright for 6 hours, slightly bright 8-10 hours Package contains: 6 *Pack 138 LED Solar Outdoor Lights 6* Screws and 6* Wall Plugs 1*User Manual

Waterproof Design

Our solar lights are waterproof design, so you don’t need to worry about the weather, you can safely use it in outdoor courtyards, corridors, fence, gardens and other places.

High-efficiency Solar Panel

Using monocrystalline silicon solar panel design, the conversion rate of the solar lamp is increased from 20% to 22%, the charging speed is faster during the day, and the lighting time at night can last longer.

Brighter & Larger Coverage Lighting

180¬∞ wide-angle lighting provides excellent brightness and greater lighting coverage. It can provide you and your family with a safer and more comfortable environment.

Power
Solar Powreded Solar Powreded Solar Powreded

LED
138 LED 138 LED 138 LED

Pack
6 Pack 8 Pack 10 Pack

„Äê3 Lighting Modes & Motion Sensor„Äë Solar lights have a built-in sensitive PIR motion sensor, which can easily capture motion. There are 3 modes:1.[ Constant light mode]: auto power on at night, auto power off during the day.2.[Dim light sensor mode]:low brightness no motion,full brightness when the motion is detected 3.[Sensor light mode]: full brightness when the motion is detected,close when no motion(Mode 3 is most energy-saving, extend battery life, it is recommended to use).
„ÄêWaterproof & Energy Saving„ÄëThe solar panel is made of high quality durable ABS material with covered LED protection screen. Even in rainy or bad weather, it can effectively isolate rainwater and can be used outdoors. Absorb sunlight during the day to convert solar energy into electricity, and at night into light to illuminate your yard or road. Green energy not only protects the environment, but also saves electricity bills.
„ÄêEasy to Install and Widely Use„ÄëSolar front door lights are easy to install, they don’t need wiring, you can install using the provided screws. Can be used in areas without power, great for outdoors, walls, gardens, patios, decks, garages, driveways, porches, fences, gutters, RVs, and more.
„ÄêHigh-efficiency Solar Panel„ÄëThe solar energy conversion rate of the solar wall lamp is increased from 20% to 22%, the charging speed is faster during the day, and the lighting time at night can last longer.
„ÄêValuable Customer Service„Äë 60-day Money Back Guarantee, 1-year Worry-free Guarantee, 24-hour Friendly Customer Service.If you have any questions or concerns during this process, you can contact us via email at any time, we will do our best to solve the problem for you.


Peasur 138 LED Solar Lights Outdoor

  • Solar light has motion smart sensor, which can detect motion sensitively. Use the sun to charge during the day and automatically light up at night. It is ideal for night lighting of pathways, driveways, gardens, hallways, patios, etc.Our solar security light has 3 modes to choose from, you can choose different modes according to your needs.
  • MODE 1.[ Constant light mode]: Auto power on at night, auto power off during the day.This mode can be on for 5-8 hours.
  • MODE 2.[Dim light sensor mode]ÔºöLow brightness no motion,full brightness when the motion is detected.Detection time is about 20 seconds.
  • MODE 3.[Sensor light mode]: Full brightness when the motion is detected,close when no motion.(Recommended to use.)Detection time is about 20 seconds.

Warm Tip:

  • You need to install the solar panel in a place where the sun can shine, and the charging effect will be better when the switch is turned on.
  • Please install the solar panel in a place where the sun can shine, the best installation height is 2-3 meters, the sensor is the most sensitive.
  • If you need to open it during the day, you need to cover the solar panel to light up.
  • The first time you use it, you need to tear off the plastic film on the surface of the solar panel and expose them to more than 8 hours.

Product Details

Battery: 1200 mAh
LED Quantity: 138 LED
Lighting Angle: 180¬∞
Detection angle: 120 ¬∞
Waterproof level: IP65
Ideal installation height: 2-3 meters
Material: ABS plastic
Sensor range: within 6-8 meters
Charging time: 8-12 hours
Use time: Full power always bright for 6 hours, slightly bright 8-10 hours
Package contains: 6 *Pack 138 LED Solar Outdoor Lights 6* Screws and 6* Wall Plugs 1*User Manual

Waterproof Design

  • Our solar lights are waterproof design, so you don’t need to worry about the weather, you can safely use it in outdoor courtyards, corridors, fence, gardens and other places.

High-efficiency Solar Panel

  • Using monocrystalline silicon solar panel design, the conversion rate of the solar lamp is increased from 20% to 22%, the charging speed is faster during the day, and the lighting time at night can last longer.

Brighter & Larger Coverage Lighting

  • 180¬∞ wide-angle lighting provides excellent brightness and greater lighting coverage. It can provide you and your family with a safer and more comfortable environment.

Product Description

Warm Tips:

Please ensure the lamps are switched on before taking them out to gather solar energyBefore you use the spike,you’d better loose up the ground a bit a suitable hole or for the spikePlease make sure the solar panel can get the sunlight directly without any shelter or glass

Specification :

Lamp type: LED

Light Number:8 LED Each Light / 12 PACKS

Power: Built-in battery

Waterproof rating: IP65

Light color: Warm White

Charging time: ‚â• 8 hours

Material: Stainless steel and ABS

Working mode: light control + switch

Working time: full charged can be lighting about 8 hours

Product Size(approx.): Diameter 11.5cm/4.53in, total length: 13cm/5.12in

AUTO TURN ON/OFF IP65 WATERPROOF 6-8 WORKING HOURS

WATERPROOF IP65

Equipment with stainless steel material which can be sealed well which is suitable for outdoor. So you don’t need worry about rain, snow, frost etc..

EASY TO INSTALL

Turn on the switch on the back of the disk lights and push the stake into the soil. These solar lights automatically turn on at night and turn off at daytime!

BRIGHTER & EFFICIENT

Turn on automatically when it gets dark, so you’ll always have light for your path, or to make your garden more beautiful and woderful.

Bright Solar Path Lights: Unlike other’s 6 leds, our solar ground lights consist of 8LED lights which means producing more light for your path,600 mAh Ni-MH battery.These Solar lights automatically turn on in darkness or at night and turn off in daytime or bright area.It can illuminate for 6-8 hours within full day charging.(Charging and working time will change depending on the weather)
Easy To Install: Turn on the switch under the cap and push the stake into the soil. These solar path lights automatically turn on at night and turn off at dawn!
High power efficiency,Our ground solar light’s energy conversion rate can be up to 14%.Solar lawn light has passed strict inspection before leaving the factory.
Note: when you receive the package, please put the item in a sunny place for charging all day. The item needs to be charged by solar energy before it can be lit. We guarantee to solve problems for customers within 24 hours and make customers happy! If you have any questions, contact us via Amazon order message. We will provide you with worry-free after-sales service.

Read more

Warm Tips:

  1. Please ensure the lamps are switched on before taking them out to gather solar energy
  2. Before you use the spike,you’d better loose up the ground a bit a suitable hole or for the spike
  3. Please make sure the solar panel can get the sunlight directly without any shelter or glass
